typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		case_number as string,
		date as string,
		block as string,
		iucr as string,
		primary_type as string,
		description as string,
		location_description as string,
		arrest as boolean,
		domestic as boolean,
		beat as short,
		district as short,
		ward as short,
		community_area as short,
		fbi_code as string,
		year as short,
		updated_on as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CrimeDataFile
CrimeDataFile derive(Date = left(date,10),
		Time = right(date, 8)) ~> ExtractDateTimeBR
ExtractDateTimeBR aggregate(groupBy(DayOfWeek = dayOfWeek(toDate(ExtractDateTimeBR@Date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')))) ~> DayOfWeekCount
ExtractDateTimeBR filter(left(ExtractDateTimeBR@Date, 7)=='2020-09') ~> Only202009
Only202009 sink(mapColumn(
		id,
		case_number,
		date = CrimeDataFile@date,
		block,
		iucr,
		primary_type,
		description,
		location_description,
		arrest,
		domestic,
		beat,
		district,
		ward,
		community_area,
		fbi_code,
		year,
		updated_on,
		Date = ExtractDateTimeBR@Date,
		Time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CopyCrimeData
